Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class AssociatedTokenProgram

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.programs.AssociatedTokenProgram
public final class AssociatedTokenProgram extends Object
Program for managing associated token accounts on the Solana blockchain.

  • Field Details

    • ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the associated token program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the associated token program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_PROGRAM_ID.

    • CREATE_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int CREATE_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for creating an account.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new account in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • IDEMPOTENT_CREATE_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int IDEMPOTENT_CREATE_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for creating an account idempotently.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new account in Solana idempotently, ensuring that if the creation is attempted multiple times, it will have the same effect as if it were done once.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • createAssociatedToken

      public AssociatedTokenProgram createAssociatedToken(ProgramDerivedAddress programDerivedAddress, PublicKey mint, PublicKey owner, PublicKey payer, PublicKey programId, boolean idempotent)
      Creates a new associated token account.
      Parameters:
      programDerivedAddress - the program derived address
      mint - the public key of the mint
      owner - the public key of the owner
      payer - the public key of the payer
      programId - the public key of the token program used to create the programDerivedAddress
      idempotent - whether the creation should be idempotent
      Returns:
      this AssociatedTokenProgram instance
